"inating" - a term that refers to the process of taking a break from work or technology to relax and disconnect from the digital world.
"Bee-utiful" - a term used to describe a beautiful flower or garden, often accompanied by a bee buzzing around it.
"Eco-mow" - a term used to describe a lawn mower that is designed to be environmentally friendly, such as using solar energy or electric power.
"Mow-cation" - a term used to describe a vacation that involves spending time outdoors and taking care of a lawn or garden.
"Mow-tastic" - a term used to describe a lawn mower that is particularly well-maintained and looks great.
